scripts.db:start: mkdir -p data && mkdir -p data/mysql && port=`cat db-port` && domain=$(basename `pwd`) && docker run -d --mount src=$(pwd)/data/mysql,target=/var/lib/mysql,type=bind --name $domain-db -p $port:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=root -e MYSQL_DATABASE=wp mysql
scripts.wp:config:recreate: composer run wp:config:delete && composer run wp:config:create
scripts.site:link: domain=$(basename `pwd`) && cd wordpress && valet unlink $domain && valet link $domain && valet secure
